article_title: IRS Commissioner John Koskinen Releases Statement On Identity Theft Measures

article_metadata.description: On November 19, 2015, IRS Commissioner Koskinen, together with Security Summit participants, announced a new public awareness campaign dedicated to protecting taxpayers against identity theft. The "Taxes. Security. Together." campaign is designed to raise public awareness and complement the protections the IRS, states and tax industry are putting in place for upcoming tax season.
article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb
